brief_title: Comparing an Investigational Medication Versus an Approved Medication in Reducing Cholesterol Levels (0653-025)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether an investigational medication will be more effective than an approved medication in reducing cholesterol levels.
intervention_name: MK0653, ezetimibe / Duration of Treatment: 28 weeks
Comparator: atorvastatin / Duration of Treatment: 28 weeks
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Elevated cholesterol levels Exclusion Criteria: - Liver disease - Unstable medical conditions
